Posts.Content: May 13, 2011 02:42PM tanlon75 wrote: I've been experiencing pain in my left breast for about a month or so now.  I went to OB and they scheduled a sonogram and mammogram.  Doctor said they didn't find anything but there is a place that is fibrous that he cannot see beyond but told me not to worry.  I have a lump/knot under my left arm, the size of a quarter or larger which he also said not to worry about.  Pain is still there and I'm getting a second opinion.
Posts.Title: Pain in breasts? mammafox tanlon75
